attributes.action: Give more funding to mental health services in the North of Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
Suicide rates are higher here than any other region of the UK
Northern Ireland still receives the least funding for mental health services 
More needs to be done and it needs to be done NOW
attributes.background: The suicide rates are shocking in Northern Ireland and substantially higher than any other region of the UK, and still we get less funding. I beg that you take notice of this. People are dying here. There needs to be more funding for more mental health services in the north of Ireland.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.

You could raise this with your local MLA: http://aims.niassembly.gov.uk/mlas/locatemla.aspx
